TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase

summary.span: 提供对配置文件属性值和信息的非类型化访问。

span.span: Provides untyped access to profile property values and information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类创建用于用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 类的强类型访问器 `ProfileCommon` 调用基类的 和 方法 ，分别检索和设置配置文件属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 类的实例 `ProfileCommon` 被设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的属性值。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. 若要在 ASP.NET 应用程序中创建用户配置文件的实例，建议使用 方法。To create an instance of a user profile in an ASP.NET application, it is recommended that you use the method. ## 继承者说明Notes to Inheritors 您可以创建从抽象类继承的自定义配置文件实现， 并为未在 [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素中指定的用户配置文件定义属性。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 您可以使用配置文件配置元素的特性在 web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型 `inherits` ，如下面的示例所示。 [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))You can specify a custom user-profile type in the web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element, as shown in the following example. 类的代码 `EmployeeProfile` 包含在本主题的 "示例" 部分中。The code for the `EmployeeProfile` class is included in the Example section of this topic. [!code-xml[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase-Config](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/config.xml)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 Web.config 文件，该文件指定一个用户配置文件，该文件包含类型为的 `ZipCode` 属性 `string` 和 `RecentSearchList` 类型为的属性 。The following code example shows a Web.config file that specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 当前生成的 属性 将具有每个指定属性的强类型访问器。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ```xml ``` 下面的示例显示一个 ASP.NET 页，该页读取和设置 `ZipCode` 为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 尝试运行此代码之前，请 `AspNetSqlProvider` 在网站的 ASP.NET 配置设置中将提供程序设置为默认值。Before attempting to run this code, set the provider to the default `AspNetSqlProvider` in the ASP.NET configuration settings for the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例定义一个继承自类的类， 以创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型在 `inherits` 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的 [配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 文件配置元素的属性中指定。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类创建用于用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 类的强类型访问器 `ProfileCommon` 调用基类的 和 方法 ，分别检索和设置配置文件属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 类的实例 `ProfileCommon` 被设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的属性值。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 用于生成存储在属性中的类的基类 可以使用 `inherits` 配置文件的 [配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 文件节的属性重写。The base class used to generate the class stored in the property can be overridden using the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) section of the configuration file. 在这种情况下，您将指定从基类继承的自定义类 。In this case you would specify a custom class that inherits from the base class. 此构造函数不应在应用程序代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from application code. 若要创建用户配置文件的实例，请使用 方法。To create an instance of a user profile, use the method. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定了一个用户配置文件，其中包含类型为的 `ZipCode` 属性 `string` 和 `RecentSearchList` 类型为的属性 。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 当前生成的 属性 将具有每个指定属性的强类型访问器。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ```xml ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页读取和设置 `ZipCode` 为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化新的配置文件实例，适用于使用自定义配置文件对象或在 non-ASP.NET 环境中管理用户配置文件的应用程序。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 此方法的重载 假定指定的用户名是经过身份验证的用户。This overload of the method assumes that the specified user name is an authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建自定义配置文件对象的实例、设置属性，并将配置文件保存到数据源。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/CS/profileBaseCreatecs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/VB/profileBaseCreatevb.aspx.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化新的配置文件实例，适用于使用自定义配置文件对象或在 non-ASP.NET 环境中管理用户配置文件的应用程序。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 此方法的重载 可用于为经过身份验证的用户或匿名用户创建配置文件。This overload of the method can be used to create a profile for an authenticated user or an anonymous user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建自定义配置文件对象的实例、设置属性，并将配置文件保存到数据源。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase GetProfileGroup(string groupName) cil managed
Public Function GetProfileGroup (groupName As String) As ProfileGroupBase

span.span: The name of the group of properties.

summary.span: 获取按组名标识的属性组。

span.span: Gets a group of properties identified by a group name.

returns.span: 利用指定组名进行配置的属性组的 对象。

span.span: A object for a group of properties configured with the specified group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于更好的组织，可将配置文件属性分成不同的组。Profile properties can be separated into groups for better organization. 属性可用于按组名称检索一组属性。The property can be used to retrieve a group of properties by the group name. 还可以通过将组名称指定为 `Profile` 每个页面上可用的属性的成员，来访问组中的配置文件属性。You can also access a profile property in a group by specifying the group name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page. 例如， `ZipCode` `Address` 可以使用访问配置文件组的成员的配置文件属性 `Profile.Address.ZipCode` 。For example, the `ZipCode` profile property that is a member of the `Address` profile group could be accessed using `Profile.Address.ZipCode`. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定了一个用户配置文件，其中包含组名为的属性组 `Address` 。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为当前的属性生成的分组属性 将位于组名称之前。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name. 例如 `Profile.Address.Street`。For example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ```xml ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 未在 properties 配置节中找到指定的配置文件属性组名。

span.span: The specified profile property group name was not found in the properties configuration section.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetPropertyValue(string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertyValue (propertyName As String) As Object

span.span: The name of the profile property.

summary.span: 获取配置文件属性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of a profile property.

returns.span: 指定的配置文件属性的值，类型化为 。

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类创建用于用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 类的强类型化访问器 `ProfileCommon` 调用 方法，以从生成的访问器中检索非类型化的值，然后将其转换为 指定的类型并返回为属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the property value. 可以使用 方法，按名称检索应用程序的用户配置文件的属性值。You can use the method to retrieve property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值是非类型化的，并且必须在检索时强制转换为特定的对象类型。Returned values are untyped and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以按名称作为每个页面上提供的配置文件属性（例如）的成员访问属性 `Profile.CustomerAddress` 。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the Profile property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页，该页读取和设置 `ZipCode` 为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 有关指定用户配置文件属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为类提供的示例 。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Initialize (string username, bool isAuthenticated);
.method public hidebysig instance void Initialize(string username, bool isAuthenticated) cil managed
Public Sub Initialize (username As String, isAuthenticated As Boolean)
public: void Initialize(System::String ^ username, bool isAuthenticated);

param.name: username
param.span: 要为其初始化配置文件的用户的名称。

span.span: The name of the user to initialize the profile for.

param.name: isAuthenticated
param.span: 指示用户是经过身份验证的用户； 指示用户是匿名用户。

span.span: to indicate the user is authenticated; to indicate the user is anonymous.

summary.span: 初始化当前用户的配置文件属性值和信息。

span.span: Initializes the profile property values and information for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不适于在您的代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 使用其中一个 重载创建用户配置文件的实例。Use one of the overloads to create an instance of the user profile.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAnonymous As Boolean
public: property bool IsAnonymous { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示用户配置文件是否用于匿名用户的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile is for an anonymous user.

value.span: 如果用户配置文件是用于匿名用户，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user profile is for an anonymous user; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节和用于指定配置文件属性的 [添加](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164646(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的 allowAnonymous 特性来启用对用户配置文件的匿名访问。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section and the allowAnonymous attribute of the [add](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164646(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element used to specify profile properties.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表明是否修改了任何配置文件属性。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether any of the profile properties have been modified.

value.span: 如果修改了任何配置文件属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if any of the profile properties have been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可由配置文件提供程序在方法中使用 ，以确定由基元类型、字符串或对象组成的属性是否已 更改。The property can be used by a profile provider during the method to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 然后，方法中的配置文件提供程序将更新已更改的属性 。Changed properties are then updated by the profile provider in the method. 如果属性为，则在页执行结束时自动调用方法 。`true`The method is automatically called at the end of page execution if the property is `true` 方法中调用的配置文件提供程序 无法显式确定具有自定义类类型或复杂类型（如集合）的配置文件属性是否已更改。A profile provider called in the method cannot explicitly determine whether a profile property with a custom class type or a complex type, such as a collection, has changed. 您可以使用 事件来确定自定义对象是否已修改并继续自动保存已修改的对象，或者在未修改任何对象时取消自动保存。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 类的默认行为 是在第一次访问该属性时，将属性设置为，以 `true` 获取自定义类型或复杂类型的属性。The default behavior of the class is to set the property to `true` for properties that are of a custom or complex type the first time the property is accessed.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: The name of the profile property.

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性按名称检索或设置应用程序的用户配置文件的属性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set the property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值的类型为 `object` ，并且在检索时必须强制转换为特定的对象类型。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以按名称作为 `Profile` 每个页面上可用属性的成员访问属性，例如 `Profile.CustomerAddress` 。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过 将属性从静态 对象集合绑定 到控件来列出用户配置文件中的属性的名称 。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 选定的属性值使用集合按名称检索 。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. 有关指定用户配置文件属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为类提供的示例 。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. public: property DateTime LastActivityDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取最近一次读取或修改配置文件的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the most recent date and time that the profile was read or modified.

value.span: 默认提供程序最近一次读取或修改配置文件的日期和时间。

span.span: The most recent date and time that the profile was read or modified by the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性值仅由默认的配置文件提供程序进行修改。This property value is only modified by the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序以外的某个提供程序对配置文件属性所做的更改不会影响 属性的值。Changes made to profile properties by a provider other than the default profile provider do not affect the value of the property.

span.span: A of objects for each property in the profile for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来获取有关为应用程序配置的配置文件属性的信息，包括属性名称和类型。You can use this property to get information about the profile properties configured for an application, including property names and types. 您还可以引用 每个属性的。You can also reference the of each property. 管理与数据源之间的属性值的存储和检索。A manages storage and retrieval of property values to and from the data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过 将属性从静态 对象集合绑定 到控件来列出用户配置文件中的属性的名称 。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 选定的属性值使用集合按名称检索 。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. 有关指定用户配置文件属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为类提供的示例 。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 用已更改的配置文件属性值更新配置文件数据源。

span.span: Updates the profile data source with changed profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将修改后的配置文件属性值写入数据源。The method writes modified profile property values to the data source. 仅当属性设置为时，配置文件提供程序才能通过执行更新来减少数据源上的活动量 `true` 。The profile provider can reduce the amount of activity at the data source by performing updates only when the property is set to `true`. 默认情况下，这是默认值 。This is the case for the default . 方法将 属性值保存到数据源后， 将设置为 `false` 。After the method has saved the property values to the data source, is set to `false`. 您可以使用 事件实现自定义逻辑，以确定是否已修改具有自定义类型或复杂类型的配置文件属性，并继续自动保存已修改的对象，或者在未修改任何对象时取消自动保存。You can use the event to implement custom logic that determines whether a profile property with a custom type or a complex type has been modified and continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

Public Sub SetPropertyValue (propertyName As String, propertyValue As Object)
public: void SetPropertyValue(System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ propertyValue);

span.span: The name of the property to set.
The value to assign to the property.

summary.span: 设置配置文件属性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类创建用于用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 类的强类型访问器 `ProfileCommon` 调用 方法，以将属性值传递到，以 存储在数据源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass property values to the to be stored at the data source. 可以使用 方法通过名称为应用程序分配用户配置文件中的属性值。You can use the method to assign property values in the user profile for your application by name. 值是非类型化的，并且会在运行时（而非编译时）执行类型检查。Values are untyped, and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以按名称作为 `Profile` 每个页面上可用的属性的成员访问属性（例如） `Profile.CustomerAddress` 。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property that is available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页，该页读取和设置 `ZipCode` 为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 有关指定用户配置文件属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为类提供的示例 。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取该配置文件的用户名。

span.span: Gets the user name for the profile.

value.span: 配置文件的用户名，或分配给配置文件的匿名用户标识符。

span.span: The user name for the profile or the anonymous-user identifier assigned to the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回与配置文件关联的经过身份验证的用户的名称，或者如果属性为，则返回分配给配置文件的匿名用户标识符 `true` 。The property returns either the name of the authenticated user that the profile is associated with or the anonymous user identifier assigned to the profile if the property is `true`. 使用 [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) 配置节和用于指定配置文件属性的 [添加](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164646(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的 allowAnonymous 特性来启用对用户配置文件的匿名访问。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section and the allowAnonymous attribute of the [add](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164646(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element used to specify profile properties.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview
